com.ooyala.android.ui

Class AbstractOoyalaPlayerLayoutController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ooyala.android.ui.AbstractOoyalaPlayerLayoutController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LayoutController, java.util.Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OoyalaPlayerLayoutController, OptimizedOoyalaPlayerLayoutController

    public abstract class AbstractOoyalaPlayerLayoutController
extends java.lang.Object
implements LayoutController, java.util.Observer

        public AbstractOoyalaPlayerLayoutController(OoyalaPlayerLayout l,
                                            java.lang.String pcode,
                                            PlayerDomain domain,
                                            AbstractOoyalaPlayerLayoutController.DefaultControlStyle dcs)
        Instantiate an AbstractOoyalaPlayerLayoutController
        Parameters:
        l - the layout to use
        pcode - the provider code to use
        domain - the embed domain to use
        dcs - the DefaultControlStyle to use (AUTO is default controls, NONE has no controls)

      • AbstractOoyalaPlayerLayoutController

        public AbstractOoyalaPlayerLayoutController(OoyalaPlayerLayout l,
                                            java.lang.String pcode,
                                            PlayerDomain domain,
                                            AbstractOoyalaPlayerLayoutController.DefaultControlStyle dcs,
                                            EmbedTokenGenerator generator)
        Instantiate an AbstractOoyalaPlayerLayoutController
        Parameters:
        l - the layout to use
        pcode - the provider code to use
        domain - the embed domain to use
        dcs - the DefaultControlStyle to use (AUTO is default controls, NONE has no controls)
        generator - An embedTokenGenerator used to sign SAS requests

      • AbstractOoyalaPlayerLayoutController

        public AbstractOoyalaPlayerLayoutController(OoyalaPlayerLayout l,
                                            java.lang.String pcode,
                                            PlayerDomain domain,
                                            AbstractOoyalaPlayerLayoutController.DefaultControlStyle dcs,
                                            EmbedTokenGenerator generator,
                                            Options options)
        Instantiate an AbstractOoyalaPlayerLayoutController
        Parameters:
        l - the layout to use
        pcode - the provider code to use
        domain - the embed domain to use
        dcs - the DefaultControlStyle to use (AUTO is default controls, NONE has no controls)
        generator - An embedTokenGenerator used to sign SAS requests
        options - Extra values, can be null in which case defaults values are used.

      • AbstractOoyalaPlayerLayoutController

        public AbstractOoyalaPlayerLayoutController(OoyalaPlayerLayout l,
                                            OoyalaPlayer p,

        Instantiate an AbstractOoyalaPlayerLayoutController
        Parameters:
        l - the layout to use
        p - the instantiated player to use
        dcs - the DefaultControlStyle to use (AUTO is default controls, NONE has no controls)
